description.value:
You crave the taste of fresh, warm blood. You take damage from positive energy and heal from negative energy as if you were undead.

At 5th level, you gain channel resistance +4.

At 10th level, you add @Compendium[pf1.spells.3efy1ico48ccrzni]{Vampiric Touch} to your list of 3rd-level oracle spells known and @Compendium[pf1.spells.joj6h1croepb9itx]{Undead Anatomy II} to your list of 5th-level oracle spells known.

At 15th level, you gain damage reduction 5/magic.
